Environment:
Applitools_RUNNER classic
Applitools_API_KEY
Applitools_APP_NAME UFT_POC
Applitools_EYE_OPEN_TIMEOUT 60000
Applitools_BATCH_NAME UFT POC
Applitools_BATCH_ID 12
Applitools_MAX_CONCURRENCY 10
Applitools_EYES_SERVER_URL https://eyes.applitools.com/
Applitools_BREAKPOINT_LAYOUT true
Applitools_LOCAL_VIEW_PORT {width: 800, height: 600}
Applitools_BROWSER_CONFIG [{ name: 'chrome', width: 1024, height: 800 },{ name: 'safari', width: 1024, height: 800 },{deviceName:'iPhone X',iosVersion:'latest',screenOrientation:'portrait'},{deviceName:'iPhone 11 Pro',iosVersion:'latest-1',screenOrientation:'landscape'},{deviceName:'Pixel 4',screenOrientation:'portrait'},{deviceName:'Pixel 4',screenOrientation:'landscape'}] -->
